home-what-answer: Briddgy is a Peer-to-Peer delivery platform, that aims to make crowdshipping accessible and secure. Using Briddgy you can send your items anywhere in the world with minimum cost, or deliver others orders and make profit.
home-pros-security-main: In Briddgy we give special attention to secruity. Every user in our platform has to have his/her email and phone number verified. Optionally we provide face verification as well.
home-pros-global-main: Everyone from any country has a place in our platform. By trying to keep our community global we will make sure that your items can be delivered anywhere in no time.
home-pros-earn-main: Earning money while travelling was never so simple!. Simply post your trips details and wait for people to give your order, or alternatively find matching orders and initate the conversation.
